page.title: 10TELEVISION.
page.content: Television is one of the main entertainments in the Penistone area.It is purely meant for pleasure.To some people it has become a third parent,they become addicted to it.Some people are also influenced by it. Our survey which was carried out in Oxspring showed that more people watched the television in the evening than in the day.Soap Opera's were the most popular(these are weekly stories of either families or places). There are programmes which are based only on the yorkshire way of life like Last of the Summer Wine. Which is filmed only 5 miles from Penistone on the edge of the Pennines. The local news programmes are Calendar and Look North.
